public static void PresentDialogModally (MonoTouch.FacebookConnect.FBSession session, string dialog, MonoTouch.Foundation.NSDictionary parameters, MonoTouch.FacebookConnect.FBWebDialogHandler handler);

.method public static hidebysig void PresentDialogModally(class MonoTouch.FacebookConnect.FBSession session, string dialog, class MonoTouch.Foundation.NSDictionary parameters, class MonoTouch.FacebookConnect.FBWebDialogHandler handler) cil managed

Docs.param: Represents the session to use for the dialog. May be nil, which uses the active session if present, or returns NO, if not.
Represents the dialog or method name, such as "feed"
A dictionary of parameters to be passed to the dialog
An optional handler that will be called when the dialog is dismissed. Note, that if the method returns NO, the handler is not called. May be nil.

summary.para: Presents a web dialog (https://developers.facebook.com/docs/reference/dialogs/) such as feed or apprequest.

remarks.para: Presents a web dialog (https://developers.facebook.com/docs/reference/dialogs/) such as feed or apprequest.

Docs.param: Represents the session to use for the dialog. May be nil, which uses the active session if present, or returns NO, if not.
Represents the dialog or method name, such as "feed"
A dictionary of parameters to be passed to the dialog
An optional handler that will be called when the dialog is dismissed. Note, that if the method returns NO, the handler is not called. May be nil.
An optional delegate to allow for advanced processing of web based dialogs. See '' for more details.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void PresentRequestsDialogModally (MonoTouch.FacebookConnect.FBSession session, string message, string title, MonoTouch.Foundation.NSDictionary parameters, MonoTouch.FacebookConnect.FBWebDialogHandler handler, MonoTouch.FacebookConnect.FBFrictionlessRecipientCache friendCache);

.method public static hidebysig void PresentRequestsDialogModally(class MonoTouch.FacebookConnect.FBSession session, string message, string title, class MonoTouch.Foundation.NSDictionary parameters, class MonoTouch.FacebookConnect.FBWebDialogHandler handler, class MonoTouch.FacebookConnect.FBFrictionlessRecipientCache friendCache) cil managed

Docs.param: Represents the session to use for the dialog. May be nil, which uses the active session if present.
The required message for the dialog.
An optional title for the dialog.
A dictionary of additional parameters to be passed to the dialog. May be nil
An optional handler that will be called when the dialog is dismissed. May be nil.

An optional cache object used to enable frictionless sharing for a known set of friends. The cache instance should be preserved for the life of the session and reused for multiple calls to the present method. As the users set of friends enabled for frictionless sharing changes, this method auto-updates the cache.
